price: Kugira igabishe ku bihano vy’Imana Allah, uwo wese afise umushaha utegera ugakurikira ukuri, maze ibihano vyagire abagarariji inyuma y’aho bashikiwe na Qor’ani, bakayihakana bivuye inyuma.
arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

meta.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqa al-qawlu ʿalā al-kāfirīna
